Detailed Description

Targeting settings for ads.

Author:
2009-2014 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved

Targeting allows partners to supply information they track internally, which is not available to Flurry's targeting system. If the targeting settings are matched on the ad server, a subset of targeted ads will be delivered to the user.

See also:
Flurry Publisher Support Site for more information

void setEnableTestAds ( boolean  enabled  ) 

Set enable test ads.

Call to receive test ads from the Flurry server to ensure proper implementation. Test ads do not generate revenue and therefore MUST be disabled before app submission.

Parameters:
enabled true to enable test ads, false to disable.
void setGender ( FlurryGender  gender  )

gender The gender of the user.
See also:
clearGender() for clearing the gender
void setKeywords ( Map< String, String >  targetingKeywords  ) 

Set the keywords.

Keywords allow the developer to specify information on a user executing an ad action for the purposes of targeting. The keywords are transmitted to the Flurry servers on each ad request.

Parameters:
targetingKeywords A Map<String,String> of key/value pairs to send to the Flurry servers when an ad is requested.
See also:
clearKeywords() for clearing the keywords

float  lon

Parameters:
lat The latitude
lon The longitude
See also:
clearLocation() for clearing the location
void setUserCookies ( Map< String, String >  userCookies  ) 

Set the user cookies.

User cookies allow the developer to specify information on a user executing an ad action. The user cookies are transmitted to the Flurry servers on each ad click. The user cookie key/value pairs will be transmitted back to the developer via the app callback if one is set.

Parameters:
userCookies A Map<String,String> of key/value pairs that will be transmitted to the Flurry servers when the ad is clicked.
See also:
clearUserCookies() for clearing the user cookies
